title: Righttype
content:
Righttype is a typeface design project by [Daniel Bretzmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230037/http:/www.eyegix.com/) that was started 2004 in Vienna, Austria. It aims at creating typefaces for printed matter and online media.

[http://www.righttype.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230037/http:/www.righttype.org/ "http://www.righttype.org")
author: graphito
